attributes.action: Open schools during the summer holidays
attributes.additional_details: As a parent to yound children, who works.full time, there is only so much that can be done to ensure a child has the best start in life.  Teaching subjects such as maths and english are specialist subjects and require qualified professionals to teach them.  Therefore any weeks lost due to the current crisis should he made.up during the long summer break
attributes.background: Parliament should enforce schools.to make up potential lost education days during the summer break to ensure a childs education is kept up to the standards expected
